data.title: add iOS EditBox multiline support
data.body:
When the inputMode is ANY, then we use TextView to input.
otherwise we use normal UITextField.

Fixed issue https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/13436

data.title: Happy merg2
data.body: 修复: Callback没有删除导致崩溃的问题;调整动画文件解析失败时，做一些容错处理，避免直接Assert让进程Core掉了

data.title: Happy merge
data.body: 修复：在不同目录下相同文件名导致的错误。调整：动画文件解析失败时，做一些容错处理，避免直接Assert让进程Core掉了。

data.title: CocosStudio的.csd檔案放在資料夾下，輸出json到loadTexture沒辦法自動預載plist
data.body:
CocosStudio的.csd檔案放在資料夾下
輸出json到使用
使用JSB或Html5，ccs.load()
到loadTexture沒辦法自動預載plist
似乎是路徑組合有問題
JSB：

data.title: 3D Sprite Not Visible on top of another 3D Sprite
data.body:
Hi,
I am trying to add a 3D sprite on top of another 3D Sprite but only the first sprite is visible on the screen.
Here is my code:
`ground = Sprite3D::create("fieldwithgp.c3t");`
`ground->setScale(0.01f);`
 `addChild(ground);`
 `auto testSprite = Sprite3D::create("orange.c3t");`
  `testSprite->setScale(0.4f);`
  `testSprite->setPosition(Vec2(visibleSize.width/4 + origin.x, visibleSize.height/4 + origin.y));`
   `ground->addChild(testSprite);`

I wanted to show testSprite at center of ground sprite but its showing at a corner and if I change the position of test sprite to bring in center of the ground it is hiding behind the ground.
